name: Mines (Bucketon)
description:
Minesweeper for the playdate! (only playable either on a playdate device or in the playdate simulator)

Features:

- 3 different board sizes: 8x8, 16x16, and 30x16

- Configurable number of maximum mines per space from 1 to 6

- Track high scores for every combination of settings

- Crank to zoom!
